name: Shrimp and Andouille Sausage with Mustard Sauce
author: LORI0808
summary: If you love Creole and Cajun dishes, you'll love this one.
ingredients: ¾ pound medium shrimp, peeled and deveined
1 ½ tablespoons finely chopped fresh garlic
1 ½ tablespoons coarse grained prepared mustard
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Add angel hair pasta, and cook for 5 to 6 minutes or until al dente
Place sausage in a large, heavy skillet over medium heat
Cook and stir until evenly browned; drain
Mix in shrimp, green onions, mushrooms, and garlic
Cook about 1 minute, until shrimp are opaque
Remove mixture from skillet, and set aside
Pour wine into the skillet, and scrape up browned bits
Mix in heavy cream, and continue cooking until reduced by about 1/3
Stir in mustard and Worcestershire sauce
Return sausage mixture to the skillet, and blend into the wine mixture
Cook and stir until heated through
